addOnsDescription:
HR and Legal support including legal document templates and a helpline for
speaking with qualified HR experts and local lawyers.

100GB of secure cloud storage plus online tech support 7 days a week,
8 am to 9 pm ( from 9 am on weekends )
Priority access to a UK based team of expert advisers, 7 days a week, 8 am to 9 pm.

If you’ve got friends and family who live abroad, call them from the UK without worrying about the cost.
For just    3 a month, you’ll get 100 minutes to call landlines and mobiles in 100 selected destinations.

Keep in touch with loved ones around the world using Vodafone International saver 500. For just    7.50 
a month, you’ll get 500 minutes to make calls from the UK to landlines and mobiles in 100 hundred 
selected destinations.
